alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:48AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CALHOUN...WEST CENTRAL GREENE COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS AND SOUTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS... At 1148 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belleview, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Belleview, Nebo, Kampsville, Eldred, Haypress, Beecreek, and Walkersville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
